thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: Kerri Hobba

author: Kerri Hobba
title: Kerri Hobba
text: Winston was awesome! Communication was excellent right from the very first contact via email. He welcomed us warmly at our Vancouver Hotel, and was friendly, professional, and extremely knowledgeable. Obviously a lot of care and consideration had gone into planning our tour, and we hit all the 'must do' sights on my extensive list (thanks for your patience, Winston!!). The car was very clean, smooth and Winston was a great driver. Totally recommended. Thanks Winston, you rock!
